item.title: Convert Joda-Time DateTime into String and Vice Versa in Java
item.description: In this Joda-Time tutorial, we learn how to convert Joda-Time’s DateTime object into String value and vice versa parse String value into Joda-Time’s DateTime object in Java. (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Add Joda Time library to your Java project To use Joda Time Java library in the Gradle build project, add the following dependency into the build.gradle file. compile group: 'joda-time', name: 'joda-time', version: '2.
